examples.user_message: I want to book_flight with origin Madrid and destination Madrid

available_flows.name: book_flight
available_flows.description: Book flights between cities with departure and return dates
trigger_intents: I want to book a flight
I need to book a ticket
Can you help me book a flight
I'd like to make a flight reservation

available_flows.name: search_flights
available_flows.description: Search for available flights and compare prices
trigger_intents: Can you search for available flights
I want to see flight options

available_flows.name: check_booking
available_flows.description: Check the status of an existing booking

available_flows.name: modify_booking
available_flows.description: Modify an existing flight booking

available_flows.name: cancel_booking
available_flows.description: Cancel a flight booking

available_commands.description: Confirm a pending action (user says yes)
Deny a pending action (user says no)
Correct a previously set slot value

flow_slots.name: origin
flow_slots.description: Which city are you departing from?

flow_slots.name: destination
flow_slots.description: Where would you like to fly to?

flow_slots.name: departure_date
flow_slots.description: When would you like to depart?

flow_slots.name: return_date
flow_slots.description: When would you like to return?

flow_slots.name: passengers
flow_slots.description: How many passengers will be traveling?

flow_slots.name: cabin_class
flow_slots.description: Which cabin class would you prefer? (economy, business, or first class)
